item.title: Chumby - FTP
item.description: I’ve been planning on turning the Chumby into a websever using lighttpd, thought it’d be kind of cool to make it do something useful rather than just standing there and showing me the time or recent facebook updates. My first idea was to just put my site on a usb disk, then run lighttpd. This was all well and good, but everytime I updated the site I had to unplug the usb disk, update the files, re-insert and then restart the chumby.
